title: Sunday: AM
overview: On Sunday morning, as Ireland prepares for the week ahead, show anchors Ivan Yates and Anna Daly will ensure you're up to date with everything you need to know. From in depth Sunday newspaper analysis, to unrivalled sports reviews; the Sunday: AM team will inform and entertain live from 9am to 12 Midday. Joined on set by Laura Woods and Tommy Martin, Sunday: AM will feature a peek into some of Ireland's most desirable homes, food from top chefs, and unrivalled expert advice on a variety of subjects.
